Total Cost of Revenue: accident and health insurance contract benefits net of reinsurance recoveries
incurred claims property casualty and liability
life and annuity contract benefits net of reinsurance recoveries
policyholder benefits and claims incurred net

Income Before Taxes: income from operations before income tax expense
Net Income: income loss from continuing operations including portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
net income loss available to common stockholders basic
net income loss available to common stockholders diluted

Interest Expense: interest credited to policyholders account balances
policyholder account balance interest expense continuing operations
Other Income (Expense): disposal group not discontinued operation gain loss on disposal
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
other realized capital gains and losses
other than temporary impairment losses investments portion recognized in earnings net
realized capital gains losses continuing operations

Depreciation and Amortization: deferred policy acquisition cost amortization expense
General and Administrative: defined benefit plan actuarial gain loss immediate recognition as component in net periodic benefit cost credit

Other Comprehensive Income: other than temporary impairment losses investments portion in other comprehensive income loss before tax portion attributable to parent

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share
Diluted EPS: income loss from continuing operations per diluted share
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Bas: weighted average number of shares outstanding basic
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number of diluted shares outstanding

Total Revenues: life and annuity premiums and contract charges net of reinsurance ceded
premiums earned net property and casualty
revenue from contract with customer excluding assessed tax

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax per basic share
income loss from discontinued operations net of tax per diluted share
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
preferred stock dividends income statement impact
property liability and casualty insurance segment member
income loss from operations before income tax expense benefit
